ComicInfo.Summary:
Colt learns Betty is being held by the outlaw Cash Collins and helps rescue her with the help of Boots, a turncoat member of Cash's gang.
Colt is wounded but brought to the settlement God's Acres by John Cabot and invited to stay but when Pecos Pete tries to hideout in the settlement and kills Jim. Colt takes up his guns again to kill Pete. The magistrate lets Colt depart in peace.
Johnstone asks Colt to become Mojave City's marshal to clean up the organized crime but Johnstone is the actual boss behind all the criminals and wants to keep Colt under his thumb by threatening to expose him as an outlaw. Colt kills Johnstone and his ringleaders then flees the town.
Colt's father is killed by Purgatory's sheriff so Colt kills the sheriff in revenge then becomes an outlaw.
ComicInfo.Title: Spawn of the Six-Gun Syndicate; The Killer of Timberline Strikes; A Killer in God's Acres; Marshal of Colt-Crazy Mojave; Hot Lead for Crooked Lawmen
